page.title: 02CALMORE HOUSING ESTATE.
page.content: The first houses were council built on farmland in the Blackwater Drive area in 1974 by builders Greaves,other developers include Wimpey.{The houses {are traditionally built,with few {bungalows,but the Community {Centre,Saxon Inn and Scout hut are {unusual buildings.}The newest homes built in 1982,are on the old Calmore Nursery site.On the estate, fully developed except for infilling.There are about{1666 houses {and 5000 people.}The estate is well cared for,an attractive area.The little vandalism is immediately rectified by the{Local Authority. There is only one shop,although a site was earmarked next to the {Community {Centre }for commercial development and there is now an interested developer.
